__e: Mom, I know you're upset and that's why I came, but...

Look, we have a lot to deal with, and I understand that you're upset.
She's upset because I don't communicate.

All that would have done was antagonize him even more because he would've known you did it.
I don't know, maybe I upset him, because he sort of just disappeared after that.
